text: Anyone who has set HubSpot Contact Owners via form submissions? I send the ID using a external Handler, but User fields are not available in forms sadly enough.
update: I am able to make the request using curl, so it might be a client issue
<@U02412A8Q3V> - you can create custom user property (contact, deal..) and add it to a form and then clone values from custom property to contact owner.
